records.Title: It's about more than the score
records.Descriptions: Stories are the way to stand out, says one the judges of the Student of the Year (SOTY) ' Sportsperson award....

records.Title: A century of conflicts
records.Descriptions: On July 7, 1937 a Japanese soldier went missing near the town of Wanping, outside Beijing. Known as the Marco Polo Incident, this affair became the catalyst for the second Sino-Japanese. The two powers were locked in bloody conflict throughout the first half of the 20th century

records.Title: The evolution of Hong Kong from outpost to megacity
records.Descriptions: Watch as Hong Kong transforms from a salt mining outpost to financial powerhouse in our 360 video project

Fast and furious: drone racing takes off in Europe and China
records.Descriptions: Drone racing is fast becoming a popular sport, not only in Europe but also in China. A total of 120 Unmanned Aerial Vehicle (UAV) participants competed for the title of 'King of Speed' in northwest China's Yinchuan City.

records.Title: Ex-US Navy admiral who partied across Southeast Asia gets 18 months in jail for lying
records.Descriptions: Over two decades, Robert Gilbeau rose through the ranks to navy admiral and earned a chest full of honours for his service, including a Bronze Star and Purple Heart....
